body.title: Example
body.elms:
```bash
Project = Model "project", ->
  @extend
    findByTitle: (title) -> ...

  @include
    markAsDone: -> ...

  # ActiveRecord::Base.include_root_in_json = false
```

```bash
project = Project.find(1)
project = Project.findByTitle("hello")

project.markAsDone()
```

body.title: Attrs
body.elms:
```bash
project = new Project(name: "Hello")

project.attr('name', "Hey")
project.attr('name')

project.save()
project.destroy()
```
